Articles.Content:
Over the past week, I have been working on a game. It is not yet complete, as seen by the sounds, and the fact that you can easily leave the screen (try not to do that).

Note that the controls for the title screen ship are (mostly) the same as the main game ship.

Without further ado, Asteroid Survival.

Enjoy!

Pretty good except

Oh god my ears.

Please work on better sounds.
